title: Phenotypic Feature
description: An individual phenotypic feature, observed as either present or absent (negated), with possible onset, modifiers and frequency FHIR mapping: Condition (https://www.hl7.org/fhir/condition.html) or Observation (https://www.hl7.org/fhir/observation.html)

description.description: Free-text description of the phenotype. Note that this is not an acceptable place to document/describe the phenotype. The type, onset, and other such fields should be used for this purpose.

label.description: Class label, aka name. For example, "Abnormality of cardiovascular system".

type.title: Phenotype Ontology
type.description: The primary ontology class which describes the phenotype. For example, "HP:0001363"  "Craniosynostosis" FHIR mapping: Condition.identifier

excluded.title: Excluded. Indicate whether or not the phenotype was observed. Default is 'false'; namely, the phenotype was observed.

severity.title: Severity Ontology
severity.description: Severity of the condition (e.g., subclasses of HP:0012824-Severity or SNOMED:272141005-Severities) FHIR mapping: Condition.severity

id.description: A CURIE-style identifier of clinical modifier (e.g., Subclasses of HP:0012823).

label.description: Clinical modifier label, aka name (e.g., "Variable expressivity").

modifiers.title: Clinical Modifiers
modifiers.description: Subclasses of HP:0012823. Clinical modifier apart from Severity HP:0012824 - Severity

iso8601duration.description: The age of this object as an ISO8601 duration or time intervals (e.g., P40Y10M05D).

age.description: The age of this individual as an ISO8601 duration or time intervals (e.g., P40Y10M05D).

iso8601duration.description: The age of this individual as ISO8601 duration or time intervals (e.g., P40Y10M05D).
The age of this individual as an ISO8601 duration or time intervals (e.g., P40Y10M05D).

id.description: The values of this will come from the HPO onset hierarchy (i.e., subclasses of HP:0003674).

label.description: Onset label, aka name (e.g., HP:0011462 "Young adult onset").

onset.description: The values of this will come from the HPO onset hierarchy (i.e., subclasses of HP:0003674) FHIR mapping: Condition.onset

iso8601duration.description: Age at which the feature resolved or abated as an ISO8601 duration or time intervals (e.g., P40Y10M05D).
Age at which the feature resolved or abated as an ISO8601 duration or time intervals (e.g., P40Y10M05D).
Age at which the feature resolved or abated as an ISO8601 duration or time intervals (e.g., P40Y10M05D).

timestamp.description: Time at which the feature resolved or abated.

interval.description: Time at which the feature resolved or abated.

resolution.description: Age or time at which the feature resolved or abated.

evidence.description: Evidences for how the phenotype was determined.

id.description: The encoded evidence type. For example, the Evidence Conclusion Ontology (https://bioportal.bioontology.org/ontologies/ECO).

label.description: Evidence label, aka name (e.g., ECO:0006060 "high throughput cell biology evidence used in automatic assertion").

evidence_code.title: Evidence Ontology
evidence_code.description: The encoded evidence type using. For example, the Evidence Conclusion Ontology (ECO - http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/eco.owl). FHIR mapping: Condition.evidence.code

id.description: For example, ISBN, PMID:123456, DOI:..., FHIR mapping: Reference.identifier

reference.description: A full or partial URL pointing to the external reference if no commonly resolvable identifier can be used in the `id` field. FHIR mapping: Reference.reference

description.description: Human readable title or display string for the reference FHIR mapping: Reference.display
